channel.title: Guides on Koazee
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Koazee

item.title: Logging with Koazee
item.description: Enabling Koazee logging Koazee provides support to log what it is happening in the stream. In the below example we will see how of easy is enable it. Actually, we just need to set a global variable ```golang logger.Enabled=true ``` Example package main import ( "github.com/wesovilabs/koazee" "github.com/wesovilabs/koazee/logger" ) var numbers = []int{1, 2, 3, 4, 4, 1} func main() { logger.Enabled = true koazee.Stream(). With(numbers). Filter(func(val int) bool { return val%2 == 0 }).
